The purpose of VCR-3 is to allow a mix of primarily residential uses, limited to singles, doubles, educational, and cultural uses. NO. 34,231 - BY: COUNCILMEMBER MORENO Brief:An Ordinance to amend and reordain Articles 7, 10, 12, 14, 15, 16, 20, 21, 22, and 26 of the Comprehensive Zoning Ordinance (Ordinance No. 4264 M.C.S., as amended by Ordinance No. 26,413 M.C.S. and subsequent amendments), to create a definition and use standards for “electric vehicle (EV) charging station (principal use)”, to reduce zoning barriers for EV charging stations with the following considerations, and otherwise to provide with respect thereto: Consider updating existing regulation

messages.title: Full Council Minutes 6-8-2023.pdf
